metadata.name: FelixFelixFelixGallery Model 0
metadata.description:
The FelixFelixFelixGallery is a miniature exhibition space dedicated to cryptoart that can be taken and shown anywhere.  
This project has started on the 22nd of October 2022 with a performance at Paris + Art Basel 2022 confronting famous cryptoart to famous contemporary art, two worlds still completely separate, ignoring each other.  
This gallery is on a world tour finding its opportunistic route from hands to hands and place to place. At each stop, it has to find a new holder that will allow the journey to continue toward a new destination.

This is model 0 (the prototype) built by FelixFelixFelix and finished the 20th October 2022.  
A regular smart phone has to be inserted inside the model to serve as rectangular screen.  
This model comes in one piece and cannot be disassembled.

Seen on the screen : Rinse and Repeat by @Clearing__
